data.message: Eminem good day, i'm coming here earnestly in my name and my wife Priscila to tell ner that we are deeply upsed by nis decision not to authorize the brodcast of nis show held here in our country called lallapalloza brazil. As fans we are humbly hope that you answer our question, becaouse as fans that we believe  we deserve this from you. thank you for you attention and heve nice day again.
